actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to establish and implement a process under which members of the public may view the proceedings of the House and the committees of the House online.

summary.text: Requires the Clerk of the House of Representatives to establish and implement a process under which members of the public may view the proceedings of the House and of its committees online through House official public Internet sites.

titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to establish and implement a process under which members of the public may view the proceedings of the House and the committees of the House online.
